relation: Defeat the first 20 missions in Assult Missions.
Defeat the first 16 missions in the challenge mode.
Beat Area 12 in the regular course.
pageTitle: Nintendo Land - The Nintendo Wiki - Wii, Nintendo DS, and all things Nintendo
textBeforeTable: Animal Crossing: Sweet Day There are 12 games and 80 stamps (5 per solo and competitive attraction; 10 (Zelda Battle Quest and Pikmin Adventure) and 15 (Metroid Blast) in cooperative attractions) total.  Games [show] Contents Nintendo Land is a launch game for the Wii U. Described as a "virtual theme park", the game features twelve amusement park-style mini-games, each based on a different Nintendo franchise. The game's focus is to introduce players to the different types of experiences and concepts possible with the Wii U GamePad. Many games are multi-player, and are built around "asymmetrical gameplay" where the player with the GamePad has a different experience than those playing with Wii Remotes. The host and tutorial character for the game is Monita‎‎, a female robot. Videos Cheats & Hints •  Gallery •  Credits •
textAfterTable: Use the stylus on the GamePad to draw gusts of wind to direct your Mii, who is hanging from balloons, through obstacles such as spikes, electric traps, birds and fish. The styles can also be used to knock spikes away. Certain power-ups appear too, including shrinking your Mii to fit through tight gaps. Stamps: Almost Fish Food: Let the giant fish appear, but don't get eaten. Special Delivery: Deliver 2 packages in one game. 30 Birds Down: Take down 30 birds. Island Hopper: Hop on every island.
